charges.charge_description: 18:2113(a).F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE-by force, violence and intimidation took $9370 in U.S. currency from Hyde Park branch of Union Bank (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Term of imprisonment of 39 months to be followed by a 3 year term of supervised release with the following conditions: not possess a firearm or other dangerous weapon, make restitution payments of at least 10&;#037; of dfts gross monthly earnings, not incur new credit charges without approval of USPO, permit USPO access to any requested financial information, participate in substance abuse and mental health programs as approved by USPO and cooperate in the collection of DNA. Restitution ordered in the amount of $9,370 payable to Union Bank due immediately. Fine wvd; $100 S/A.
